title: Omniture
custom_preconds: GIVEN that Omniture is incorporated into all necessary pages
custom_expected:
THEN Omniture will track:
page views
some actions on some pages
username
organization

title: Omniture on login page
custom_preconds: GIVEN that Omniture is incorporated into the login page
custom_expected: THEN Omniture will not track username or organization for this page.

title: QUESTIONS: Tracked events and data
custom_preconds: GIVEN that Draft Prospect system is tracking site events
custom_expected:
THEN system will track the following:
invite is sent to Prospect (date, time, linkID)
Prospect clicks invite (date, time)
organization ID of the invite sender
Prospect signs up (date, time)
task is assigned to Prospect
Prospect logs in
MLB user logs in
Author creates questionnaire
Author creates questionnaire page
Author creates question
Author updates question
Author deletes question
Author submits questionnaire for approval -- to Admin, or only to Central Office?
questionnaire is rejected
questionnaire is approved
questionnaire is commented upon?

System also must track:
number of Prospects in system
number of Prospects per type of device used to sign up
mobile overview
unique and repeated visits to site by Prospects
unique and repeated visits to site by MLB employees
date a task is assigned to a Prospect
date a Prospect completes a task
